page.title: 19Attitudes
page.content: {Amenity Societies:} There is a Civic Society, a society for local study; & 4 parts of Frome have residents assoc- iations. {Reading:}Out of 100 ten year old children we interviewed 76% enjoyed reading. The most popular book was adventure (84%), then cartoons with 67%, science fiction 31%, poetry 18%. 45% used the town library. 47% read a newspaper occasionally & 28% never.{Of the adults, 63% read a sunday paper, 72% a daily paper, & a local one. 49% found the local paper imformative, 53% found the paper interesting, 55%useful & 23%relevent. {Smoking:}Out of 100 adults we interviewed, 16% smoked regularly, 9% occasionally and 75% never. By Jo Spring & Julia Hawes
